contexts.context: Smuggling and organized crime have become increasingly <mark>aggressive</mark> and violent in the Redoran House Districts. The councilors blame...
.... The councilors blame local corruption, weakened enforcement, and <mark>aggressive</mark> competition between the Thieves Guild and the Camonna Tong.
...the unfortunate disturbances of the public peace resulting from the increasingly <mark>aggressive</mark> competition between the Thieves Guild and the Camonna Tong for control...
